annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: under negotiation as of December 31, 2020. Agreements are in place with the other six bargaining units in Canada, two are effective until December 31, 2021, and four are effective until 2022.
annotations.translation: 截至2020年12月31日，正在谈判中。与加拿大其他六个谈判单位签订了协议，其中两个协议有效期至2021年12月31日，四个协议有效期至2022年。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: In the U.S., there are currently 28 active bargaining units on three subsidiary railroads representing nearly 1,900 unionized active employees. Nine agreements are open for amendment and are under negotiation at this time. 15 agreements will become amendable in 2021 and one in 2022. Negotiations have been concluded with respect to the remaining three agreements which will expire beyond 2022.
annotations.translation: 在美国，目前 3 条附属铁路有 28 个活跃的谈判单位，代表着近 1,900 名工会在职员工。九项协议可开放修改，目前正在谈判中。 15 项协议将于 2021 年进行修订，1 项协议将于 2022 年进行修订。其余三项协议的谈判已结束，并将于 2022 年之后到期。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: CP is an industry leader in rail safety and we are committed to protecting our employees, our communities, our environment, and our customers' goods. This is CP's 15th consecutive year as industry leader in train accident statistics. Operate Safely is one of our five foundations of successful railroading and it starts with knowing and following the rules. Aside from running trains, many of our employees work in yards, terminals, and shops across our network with machinery and heavy equipment, or in extreme weather conditions. Their safety and security is of utmost importance to CP and is foundational to the way we view employee safety education and training. CP HomeSafeTM is an initiative designed to improve our safety culture by tapping into the human side of safety and promoting both safety engagement and feedback. HomeSafeTM puts everyone on the same level and empowers all employees to begin a safety conversation, no matter the rank or position. Safety performance is disclosed publicly on a quarterly basis using standardized metrics set out by the FRA. Additional information on FRA safety measures is included in Performance Indicators in Item 7. Management's Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations.
annotations.translation: CP 是铁路安全的行业领导者，我们致力于保护我们的员工、我们的社区、我们的环境和客户的货物。这是CP连续第15年成为火车事故统计的行业领导者。安全运营是我们成功铁路的五个基础之一，它始于了解和遵守规则。除了运营铁路外，我们的许多员工还在我们网络中的货场、码头和商店工作，配备机械和重型设备，或在极端天气条件下工作。他们的安全和保障对 CP 至关重要，也是我们看待员工安全教育和培训方式的基础。CP HomeSafeTM是一项旨在通过挖掘安全的人性化方面并促进安全参与和反馈来改善我们的安全文化的倡议。HomeSafeTM将每个人都处于同一水平上，并授权所有员工开始安全对话，无论级别或职位如何。安全绩效每季度使用FRA制定的标准化指标公开披露。有关FRA安全措施的其他信息包含在项目7的绩效指标中。管理层对财务状况和经营业绩的讨论和分析。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: CP's approach for talent management begins with our Human Resources department, which oversees recruitment, hiring, development, engagement, and retention with the current and future workforce and leadership of CP.
annotations.translation: CP 的人才管理方法始于我们的人力资源部门，该部门负责监督 CP 现有和未来员工及领导层的招聘、雇用、发展、参与和留用。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The Management Resources and Compensation Committee of the Board of Directors reviews and informs CP's compensation plan and programming, and makes recommendations to the Board on succession planning for senior management and processes to identify, develop, and retain executive talent. Additionally, as part of CP's succession planning program, senior leaders are actively engaged in building the pool of future leaders, and present their development plans to the Board.
annotations.translation: 董事会的管理资源和薪酬委员会负责审查并通报 CP 的薪酬计划和规划，并就高级管理层的继任计划以及识别、培养和留住高管人才的流程向董事会提出建议。此外，作为CP继任计划的一部分，高管积极参与着未来领导者人才库的建设，并向董事会提出他们的发展计划。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: CP maintains a number of internal policies related to recruitment, relocation, compensation, employment equity, and diversity and inclusion. The effective implementation of these policies alongside our ongoing workforce initiatives ensures CP's attraction and recruitment, employee development, succession, engagement, and diversity and inclusion practices are consistent and aligned with CP's commitments, foundations and values.
annotations.translation: CP制定了许多与招聘、搬迁、薪酬、就业公平以及多元化和包容性相关的内部政策。这些政策的有效实施以及我们正在进行的员工队伍计划可确保CP的吸引力和招聘、员工发展、继任、敬业度以及多元化和包容性实践与CP的承诺、基础和价值观保持一致。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: With rail network spanning Canada and the U.S., we employ a number of recruitment and retention tactics to attract the best and diverse talent across North America. CP offers many rewarding career opportunities in a variety of roles within the organization in both operating and support functions. We base our recruitment strategy on workforce planning needs, and our focus is on ensuring that we have a diverse candidate pool to fill our open positions.
annotations.translation: 凭借横跨加拿大和美国的铁路网络，我们采用了一系列招聘和留用策略，以吸引北美地区最优秀的多元化人才。 CP 在公司内部的运营和支持职能部门的各种岗位上提供了许多有价值的职业发展机会。 我们的招聘策略以劳动力规划需求为基础，重点是确保我们有一个多元化的候选人库来填补我们的空缺职位。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: CP recognizes the valuable skills and experience that veterans have gained from serving their country. Our veteran program was recognized as part of Canada's Best Diversity Employers® of 2020 and we were named part of the top 10 Military Friendly® employers in the U.S. for 2021.
annotations.translation: CP认可退伍军人从为国家服务中获得的宝贵技能和经验。我们的退伍军人计划被公认为2020年加拿大最佳多元化雇主®的一部分，我们被评为2021年美国十大军事友好雇主之一。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: CP tracks recruitment performance and success rates to better understand which tactics, benefits, and strategic partnerships are most successful in bringing in and retaining new talent.
annotations.translation: CP 跟踪招聘绩效和成功率，以便更好地了解哪些策略、福利和战略合作伙伴关系在引进和留住新人才方面最为成功。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: As part of our core foundation and commitment to Develop People, we encourage all employees to take an active role in their career planning and development. We believe that investing in our employees leads to improved workplace morale and fosters a supportive working environment.
annotations.translation: 作为我们核心基础和“培养人才”承诺的一部分，我们鼓励所有员工在他们的职业规划和发展中发挥积极作用。我们相信，投资于员工可以提高工作场所士气，并营造支持性的工作环境。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: CP offers a variety of training courses through our Learning Management System that provides online and technical training, including mandatory, role-specific and voluntary courses. This enables our employees to succeed in their current roles and prepares them for career advancement opportunities.
annotations.translation: CP 通过我们的学习管理系统提供各种培训课程，包括必修课程、特定角色课程和自愿课程等在线培训和技术培训。 这使我们的员工能够在现有岗位上取得成功，并为他们的职业晋升机会做好准备。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Non-union employees also complete annual performance management and development action plans with their supervisors to set individual goals and track progress against Company expectations as well as long-term career goals.
annotations.translation: 非工会员工还与上司一起完成年度绩效管理和发展行动计划，以设定个人目标，并根据公司期望以及长期职业目标跟踪进度。
